Board.PhysicsBoard¶

PhysicsBoard is a child class of Board

PhysicsBoard¶

class miniworldmaker.boards.physics_board.PhysicsBoard(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
add_to_board(token, position)[source]¶

Adds a token to the board. The method is called with __init__ method of the token

Parameters

  • token – The token to add to board.

  • position – The position where the token should be added.

Returns:
